## Products from this activity include:

## Code

* [Data harmonization and aggregation scripts](https://github.com/srearl/soilHarmonization) that produced L1 and L2 data products
* [Data visualization](https://github.com/lter/lterwg-som-shiny) code
* Additional code for analyses is on our project [GitHub page](https://github.com/lter/lterwg-som)


## Papers

* Malhotra, A., K Todd-Brown, L Nave, et al. (2019). The landscape of soil carbon data: emerging questions, synergies and databases. _Progress in Physical Geography: Earth and Environment_. [doi:10.1177/0309133319873309](https://doi.org/10.1177/0309133319873309).
